definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: remain over (NH id.; Aram. [[יְתַר]], yitar id.; Zinj. [[יתר]] n. rest, remainder; Eth. watara: As. [atâru], remain over, in der. conj., Dl:HWB; in Sab. [[ותר]] CIS:iv, 15, 46, p. 77; esp. n. [[ותר]] as epithet of king = noble one, and as n.pr. [[ותרם]] Mordt:ZMG, 1876, 37, 292 DHM:ZMG, 1883, 15 CIS:iv, 10; Ar. watara is make single make to be one, or an odd number)—†

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be left over, remain over; Pf. [[נוֹתַר]] Ex 10:15 + 8 t., etc.; Impf. [[יִוׇּתֵר]] 2Ki 20:17 + 2 t.; [[יִוׇּתֶ֥ר בָָּהּ]] Zec 13:8; [[וַיִּוׇּתֵר]] Ge 32:25 + 2 t.; [[וׇאִוׇּתֵר]] 1Ki 19:10, 1Ki 19:14, etc.; Pt. [[נוֹתָר]] 1Sa 2:26 + 17 t., [[נׁתָר]] Ex 12:10; fs. [[נוֹתֶ֫רֶת]] Le 2:3 + 3 t.; mpl. [[נוֹתָרִים]] Ju Jdg 8:10 + 24 t., etc.;—be left over, remain (over), abs. Ex 10:15 (J), Jos 11:11, Jos 11:22 (D), Ju Jdg 9:5, Is 1:8, Is 30:17, 1Ki 18:22, 2Ki 20:17 = Is 39:6; sq. [[לְבַדּוֹ]] be left alone Ge 32:25 (J), so 1Ki 19:10, 1Ki 19:14; sq. [[מִן]] be left from (= of) 2Sa 13:30, Ex 29:34, Nu 26:65 (both P), Ps 106:11; pt. sq. [[מִן]] Ju Jdg 8:10 + 10 t. P, 1Ki 9:20 = 2Ch 8:7, Zec 14:16, 1Ch 6:46; sq. [[לְ]], be left (surviving) to, 1Sa 25:34, 2Sa 9:1, of those belonging to Ge 44:20 (J; [[לְבַדּוֹ לְאִמּוֹ]]); sq. [[בְּ]] be left in (= of) 2Sa 17:12, Jos 18:2 (JE), also pt. Le 8:32, Le 14:18 (P), Ez Eze 48:15, Eze 48:15; oft. sq. [[בְּ]] loc. Am 6:9 + 11 t.; sq. [[בֵּית]] in the house of Je 27:21; sq. [[על־פני הארץ]] Ez Eze 39:14 (pt.); sq. [[אַחֲרֵי]] = be left behind (of sons) 1Ki 9:21 = 2Ch 8:8; sq. [[שָׁם]] + [[אֵחֶל]] Da 10:13 I was left over there beside the kings (i.e. I had nothing more to do; cf. VB); elsewh. pt. abs., as adj. Ge 30:36 (J), Jos 17:2, Jos 17:6 (JE), Le 10:12, Le 10:16, Le 27:18, Jos 21:5, Jos 21:26, Jos 21:34 (all P), Je 34:7, 1Ch 6:55, 1Ch 6:62, 1Ch 22:20; as subst. Ju Jdg 21:7, Jdg 21:16, 1Sa 30:9, Ex 28:10, Ex 29:34, Le 19:6 (all P), 1Ki 20:30, 1Ki 20:30, 2Ki 4:7, Ez Eze 34:18, Eze 48:21, 2Ch 31:10.

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: leave over, leave Ex 10:15 (J), Ru 2:14 (obj. om.), v:Ru 2:18, 2Ki 4:43 ([[אָכוֹל וְהוֹתֵר]], v. infr.), v:2Ki 4:44 (obj. om. in both), 2Ch 31:10; [[יֶתֶר בָּנׇיו אֲשֶׁר יוֹתִיר]] De 28:54; sq. obj. [[שָׂרִיד]] + [[ל]] pers. Is 1:9; obj. [[שְׁאֵרִית]] + [[ל]] pers. Je 44:7; sq. [[מִן]] from (= of), 2Sa 8:4 = 1Ch 18:4, Nu 33:55 (P), Ez Eze 12:16; + [[עַד]] temp. Ex 12:10, Ex 16:19, Ex 16:20 (all P), Le 22:30 (H); + [[שָׁם]] loc. Ez Eze 39:28.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: abs. leave a remnant Ez Eze 6:8 (denom. fr. [[יֶתֶר]] ?).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: save over, i.e. preserve alive Ps 79:11.
excel, shew pre-eminence Ge 49:4 (poem in J).
shew excess = have more than enough Ex 36:7 (P; vid. also 2Ki 4:43, 2Ch 31:10 supr.); make abundant De 28:11, De 30:9 (sq. sf. pers. + [[ב]] rei).
